channel.title: Cannot connect to server
channel.description:
Alright, here we go.
Base: Shard Vexillum
I've been trying for a good 3 hours to get my client to connect to my server. I've checked everything. Changed ip in client, made sure it's portforwarded right, checked my no-ip duc, and it's strange but when I log in on a different source it works. Whoever could help me with this I would greatly appreciate it. Also, I even fooled around with the source files! When I try to log in it says "error connecting to server. please fix your connection!" Once again I would appreciate the help.

item.title: Cannot connect to server
item.dc:creator: @oldskoolpk oldskoolpk
item.description:
@oldskoolpk wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:6, topic:407176”][quote author=K F C link=topic=508467.msg3688805#msg3688805 date=1311993507]
EDIT: Wow, I fixed the problem. I simply went into my client.java client sided and changed the port from 43595 to 43594, then changed it server sided and compiled and ran. Thanks for your help anyway guys ;D
[/quote]Your welcome! :D[/quote]

Your an idiot. Your attitude pisses me off.

Read full topic
